tool_description:
Our fast API offers a wide range of data for every country on the planet, making it the ultimate resource for developers, businesses, researchers, and enthusiasts.

Key Features:

🌍 Global Coverage: Access detailed information for all countries worldwide, from the largest nations to the smallest territories.

📊 Comprehensive Data: Get essential details, including population, geography, government, economy, history, culture, infrastructure, and more, all in one place.

🔍 Search and Retrieve: E...
name: World Countries Data
title: World Countries Data

api_list.name: Get all cities by {countryId}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-countries-data.p.rapidapi.com/cities/get-all-cities-by-country/75"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-countries-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-countries-data.p.rapidapi.com/cities/get-all-cities-by-country/{countryid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-countries-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Answer by {countryId} and {questionId}
api_list.description: Get Answer by countryId and questionId
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-countries-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
